1.「ぬぬ？ 考え直しますかな。| 聖紋と引き換えにさずける 探索の極意を| ひとつ: Hmm? Changed your mind? Please choose one|of the exploration secrets I'll give you|in exchange for crests.|<break>

2.<select_se_off>|探索開始時 海神のうろこ３個追加|錬金効果＋３の: <select_se_off>|Begin with 3 Scales|Find All +3 Equipment|Can Take 2 Extra Equips|Explanation|Cancel|<select_end>|<case 1>|<close>|<case 2>|<close>|<case 3>|<close>|<case 4>|<break>|<case 5>|<break>|<case_cancel>|<break>|<case_end>

4.「探索の極意は 遺跡の探索に| 効果を発揮する 特殊なわざなのです。| １回の探:
A secret of exploration is a special technique|that's effective while searching the ruins.|Its effect lasts for one exploration.|
|Only the party leader's secret will take|effect, and all party members will benefit|from it.|
|Rest assured, those member's secrets won't|be overwritten from the leader's effect.|
|Furthermore, your secret will remain so long|as you don't explore the ruins, so do as you|wish in the meantime.|
|I can only give you one secret at a time, so|please examine each one carefully.|
|Lastly, you can view your current secret at|the entrance menu here or the Zelmea Menu|inside of the ruins.|

5.ゼルメアの聖紋<%nM_EXCHANGE_NUM>個と 引き換えに|<%sM_K: You'll give me <%dM_EXCHANGE_NUM> Zelmea Crests in exchange|for <%sM_Kouka>?|<yesno2>|<case 1>|<break>|<case 2>|<close>|<case_cancel>|<close>|<case_end>

6.「かたじけない。さずけた探索の極意は| １回の探索のあいだ 効果がありますぞ。|:
Much appreciated. The secret I've given will|last for one exploration.|
|In a party, the leader's secret will take|effect and all members will benefit.|Good luck!|

7.<pc>は 冒険者ジグロウから|探索の極意を さずけてもらった！<se_nots: <pc> was a given a secret of|exploration from Adventurer Jiguro!<se_nots System 7>

8.「……やや 遺跡の探索者でありますかな？|<br>|「拙者は ジグロウと申す者。:
...hey, aren't you an explorer of these ruins?|
|My name is Jiguro. I'm adventurer and a|collector, and love to collect armor from|all over the world.|
|I've been so fascinated with these strange|ruins and collecting armor that I ran out of|Zelmea Crests to use.|
|You are... , I presume. I|see you've been collecting armor as well.|
|I'd be grateful for any Zelmea Crests you|could share. In exchange, I'll show you some|exploration secrets I have learned.|

9.「……やや <pc>殿ではありませぬか！| 遺跡の探索に 向かわれるのですかな。:
...well, if it isn't !|Are you planning to explore the ruins?|
|I'd like go exploring too, but I got a bit|carried away with collecting armor that I|ran out of Zelmea Crests.|
|I'd be grateful for any Zelmea Crests you|could share. In exchange, I'll show you some|exploration secrets I have learned.|

10.「おお 気が変わりましたかな。| 拙者が会得した 探索の極意を さずけるゆえ|: Oh, you changed your mind? If you share your|crests with me, I will share my secrets|of exploration.|<bw_break>

11.「おお <pc>殿！| 聖紋をいただき 感謝いたす。| これでまた 防具の収集に:
Oh, ! Thank you for the|crests. Now I can resume collecting armor.|
|Please take care, . I would|be grateful if those secrets end up being|of some use to you.|

12.「聖紋と 引き換えにさずける| 探索の極意を ひとつ 選んでくだされ。|<bre: Choose an exploration secret to exchange for|Zelmea Crests.|<break>

13.「もし ほかの探索の極意を ご所望であれば| ひとつ 選び直してくだされ。| 選: If you would like another secret, please|choose another. It won't cost you any crests.|<break>

14.「探索の極意を ひとつ 選び直してくだされ。| 選び直しに 聖紋は必要ありませぬ: Please select one secret. It won't cost|any crests to select again.|<break>

15.「……むむ？ どうやら ゼルメアの聖紋を| 持っていないようですな……。| いた: ...Hm? It seems you do not have any Zelmea|Crests.... Looks like we'll have to do this|another time.|<end>

16.遺跡内では パーティリーダーの 探索の極意が|パーティ全員にかかりますが よろし: The party leader's exploration secret will be|applied to the party. Is this okay? The other|members' secrets will not be overwritten.|<yesno2><break>

17.<%sM_Kouka> の代わりに|<%sM_Kouka2> を|さずけてもらい: So you'd like to have <%sM_Kouka2>|instead of <%sM_Kouka>?|<yesno>|<case 1>|<break>|<case 2>|<close>|<case_cancel>|<close>|<case_end>

18.「むむ？ その探索の極意は| すでに さずけておりますぞ。|<bw_break>: Hmm? I've already given you a secret.|<bw_break>
